Articles.Content: Will support be added for flight and throttle sticks such as the Saitec x56 series and x52 series controllers?
I just hope they allow for far more inputs than KSP1 (Maxed out at 16 buttons, and something like 4 axis)

from what i've been able to discern from Unity, dual controller support is whacked in the latest engine. I havent tried the iJoy driver yet, but people there are complaining about movement lag with that driver and the latest unity engine release.
